attributes.action: Do random checks on chocolate bars to check for harmful items inside
attributes.background: Introduce legislation to randomly check edible items on sale for harmful items like pins and sharps. Or at least do this when candy is in season, e.g. Halloween or easter

rejection.details:
There is already extensive regulation about product safety: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/product-safety-advice-for-businesses

Decisions about ensuring product safety requirements are a matter for individual retailers, not the Government or Parliament.
